alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings; Nassau; New York; Queens; Richmond; Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 3:31PM EST until February 19 at 3:45PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EST FOR SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...HUDSON...SOUTHEASTERN UNION...SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN...WESTCHESTER...QUEENS...RICHMOND...BRONX...KINGS... ROCKLAND...NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND NASSAU COUNTIES... At 330 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Bethel to Flatbush, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Elizabeth, Stamford, Flatbush, Norwalk, New Rochelle, Flushing, Bayonne, White Plains, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont and Hackensack. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
